thread.title: Brian The Best Chef & Nicolas The Best Manager.
thread.title_full: Brian The Best Chef & Nicolas The Best Manager. - Review of Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Carluke22
title: Brian The Best Chef & Nicolas The Best Manager.
text:
My Wife and I have the opportunity to travel the Country, and in doing so we stay mainly in a Premier Inn, no matter where we go.
I honestly have to say that The PremierInn in Brixton makes us feel most at home. Not only is Brian a fantastic Chef, but his porridge is absolutely the best in the Premier Inn chain.
The Manager Nicholas is by far the manager who has impressed me most. He is a credit to the organisation he currently represents. I am sure no matter his direction in life he will do well.
I would have no hesitation in recommending The PremierInn at Brixton to anyone, which is a credit to Nicholas and all his staff, that do all they can to make every guest at Brixton feel more than welcome.
Two Very happy Guests.
Mr & Mrs Steele.
